name: moanim
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wmo(s0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wmo(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1))))
-| wi(wex(s0, wa(w0, w1)), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wmo(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1))))
-| wi(wex(s0, wa(w0, w1)), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1))))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, wa(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wmo(s0, w1)))
-| wi(wex(s0, wa(w0, w1)), w0)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, wa(w0, w1)))

|- wb(wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wmo(s0, w1)))
-| wi(wex(s0, wa(w0, w1)), w0)
-| wnf(s0, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, wa(w0, w1)), w0)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wmo(s0, w1)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), w0)

|- wb(wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wmo(s0, w1)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)

comment: Introduction of a conjunct into "at most one" quantifier. For a version requiring disjoint variables, but fewer axioms, see ~ moanimv . (Contributed by NM, 3-Dec-2001.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 24-Dec-2018.)
